name: part_002
file: tmp_【#天音かなた卒業ライブ】「絶対的アイドル」 ⧸ Amane Kanata Graduation LIVE ＂THE ABSOLUTE IDOL＂【hololive】 [8iGGL_0CEpc]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performing 'Peace Sign' on a digital stage with blue lighting effects.
Kanata performing 'That's Why I Gave Up on Music' with a more somber, purple and green lighting atmosphere.
scenes.song_name: Dakara Boku wa Ongaku wo Yameta

subtitles.original: Oh-oh-oh...
subtitles.english: Oh-oh-oh...

subtitles.original: いつか僕らの上をスレスレに通り過ぎていったあの飛行機を
subtitles.english: That airplane that passed right over us that day,

subtitles.original: 不思議なくらいに覚えてる
subtitles.english: I remember it strangely well,

subtitles.original: 意味もないのに なぜか
subtitles.english: Even though there's no meaning to it, somehow.

subtitles.original: 不甲斐なくて泣いた日の夜に
subtitles.english: On the night I cried from feeling worthless,

subtitles.original: ただ強くなりたいと願ってた
subtitles.english: I just wished to become stronger.

subtitles.original: そのために必要な勇気を探し求めていた
subtitles.english: I was searching for the courage I needed for that.

subtitles.original: 残酷な運命が定まってるとして
subtitles.english: Even if a cruel fate is destined,

subtitles.original: それがいつの日か僕の前に現れるとして
subtitles.english: Even if it appears before me someday,

subtitles.original: ただ一瞬
subtitles.english: Just for a moment,

subtitles.original: この一瞬 息ができるなら
subtitles.english: If I can breathe for just this moment,

subtitles.original: どうでもいいと思えた その心を
subtitles.english: I felt like nothing else mattered. That heart...

subtitles.original: もう一度 遠くへ行け
subtitles.english: Go far away once more!

subtitles.original: 遠くへ行けと
subtitles.english: Go far away!

subtitles.original: 僕の中で誰かが歌う
subtitles.english: Someone is singing inside me.

subtitles.original: どうしようもないほど熱烈に
subtitles.english: So passionately that I can't help it.

subtitles.original: いつだって目を腫らした
subtitles.english: My eyes were always swollen,

subtitles.original: 君が二度と悲しまないように
subtitles.english: So that you would never be sad again,

subtitles.original: 笑えるそんなヒーローになるための歌
subtitles.english: A song to become a hero who can laugh.

subtitles.original: さらば掲げろピースサイン
subtitles.english: Farewell, raise your peace sign!

subtitles.original: 転がっていくストーリーを
subtitles.english: Let this rolling story go on.

subtitles.original: 守りたいだなんて言えるほど
subtitles.english: I'm not strong enough to say I want to protect you,

subtitles.original: 君が弱くはないの分かってた
subtitles.english: I knew you weren't that weak.

subtitles.original: それ以上に僕は弱くてさ
subtitles.english: I was even weaker than that,

subtitles.original: 君が大事だったんだ
subtitles.english: You were just so precious to me.

subtitles.original: 独りで生きてくんだなんてさ
subtitles.english: "I'm going to live on my own."

subtitles.original: 口をついて叫んだあの日から
subtitles.english: Since that day I blurted that out,

subtitles.original: 変わっていく僕を笑えない
subtitles.english: I can't laugh at myself changing,

subtitles.original: 独りが怖い僕を
subtitles.english: At myself who is scared of being alone.

subtitles.original: 蹴飛ばして噛み付いて
subtitles.english: Kicking and biting,

subtitles.original: 息もできなくて
subtitles.english: unable to even breathe,

subtitles.original: 騒ぐ頭と腹の奥がぐしゃぐしゃになったって
subtitles.english: Even if my noisy head and gut get all messed up.

subtitles.original: 衒いも外連も
subtitles.english: Even the pretense and theatrics,

subtitles.original: 消えてしまうくらいに
subtitles.english: to the point they disappear,

subtitles.original: 今は触っていたいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to touch it right now,

subtitles.original: 君の心に
subtitles.english: Touch your heart.

subtitles.original: 僕たちはきっといつか遠く離れた
subtitles.english: We surely reached out far someday,

subtitles.original: 太陽にすら手が届いて
subtitles.english: even reaching the sun,

subtitles.original: 夜明け前を手に入れて笑おう
subtitles.english: Let's seize the time before dawn and laugh.

subtitles.original: そうやって青く燃える色に染まり
subtitles.english: Dyed in that burning blue color,

subtitles.original: おぼろげな街の向こうへ
subtitles.english: towards the other side of the hazy city,

subtitles.original: 手をつないで走っていけるはずだ
subtitles.english: we should be able to run hand in hand.

subtitles.original: 君と未来を盗み描く
subtitles.english: Stealing and sketching the future with you,

subtitles.original: ひねりのないストーリーを
subtitles.english: a story with no twists.

subtitles.original: カサブタだらけ荒くれた日々が
subtitles.english: Those rough days covered in scabs,

subtitles.original: 削り削られ擦り切れた今が
subtitles.english: this worn-out present, whittled down,

subtitles.original: 君の言葉で蘇る
subtitles.english: are revived by your words,

subtitles.original: 鮮やかにも現れていく
subtitles.english: appearing so vividly.

subtitles.original: 蛹のままで眠る魂を
subtitles.english: The soul sleeping inside the chrysalis,

subtitles.original: 食べかけのまま捨てたあの夢を
subtitles.english: that dream thrown away half-eaten,

subtitles.original: もう一度取り戻すよ
subtitles.english: I'll take them back once more!

subtitles.original: Oh-oh-oh...
subtitles.english: Oh-oh-oh...

subtitles.original: Oh-oh-oh...
subtitles.english: Oh-oh-oh...

subtitles.original: もう一度 遠くへ行け
subtitles.english: Go far away once more!

subtitles.original: 遠くへ行けと
subtitles.english: Go far away!

subtitles.original: 僕の中で誰かが歌う
subtitles.english: Someone is singing inside me.

subtitles.original: どうしようもないほど熱烈に
subtitles.english: So passionately that I can't help it.

subtitles.original: いつだって目を腫らした
subtitles.english: My eyes were always swollen,

subtitles.original: 君が二度と悲しまないように
subtitles.english: So that you would never be sad again,

subtitles.original: 笑えるそんなヒーローになるための歌
subtitles.english: A song to become a hero who can laugh.

subtitles.original: さらば掲げろピースサイン
subtitles.english: Farewell, raise your peace sign!

subtitles.original: 転がっていくストーリーを
subtitles.english: Let this rolling story go on.

subtitles.original: 君と未来を盗み描く
subtitles.english: Stealing and sketching the future with you,

subtitles.original: ひねりのないストーリーを
subtitles.english: a story with no twists.

subtitles.original: 考えたってわからないし
subtitles.english: Even if I think about it, I don't understand.

subtitles.original: 青空の下、君を待った
subtitles.english: I waited for you under the blue sky.

subtitles.original: 風が吹いた正午
subtitles.english: At noon when the wind blew,

subtitles.original: 昼下がりを抜け出す想像
subtitles.english: I imagined escaping the early afternoon.

subtitles.original: ねぇ、これからどうなるんだろうね
subtitles.english: Hey, I wonder what will happen from now on.

subtitles.original: 進め方教わらないんだよ
subtitles.english: No one taught us how to proceed.

subtitles.original: 君の目を見た
subtitles.english: I looked into your eyes.

subtitles.original: 何も言えず僕は歩いた
subtitles.english: Saying nothing, I just walked.

subtitles.original: 考えたってわからないし
subtitles.english: Even if I think about it, I don't understand.

subtitles.original: 青春なんてつまらないし
subtitles.english: Youth is just boring.

subtitles.original: 辞めたはずのピアノ
subtitles.english: The piano I was supposed to have quit,

subtitles.original: 机を弾く癖が抜けない
subtitles.english: I can't stop the habit of playing on my desk.

subtitles.original: ねぇ、将来何してるだろうね
subtitles.english: Hey, I wonder what we'll be doing in the future.

subtitles.original: 音楽はしてないといいね
subtitles.english: I hope I'm not doing music.

subtitles.original: 困らないでよ
subtitles.english: Don't look so troubled.

subtitles.original: 心の中に...
subtitles.english: Inside my heart...
